sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-SPaRe data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda Ganta Afäšum, ṭabiya ʿAddi Qänäy, qušät Mǝʾǝsar Gwǝḥila

note.desc: Post-Aksumite potsherds (dating between 700/800 and 1200/1300 A.D.), remains of early medieval structures have been recorded at the site.
note.ab: Gätär. Burial places are located under the overhanging rock, along the river ʾAngar. The old deserted church rock-churcn stands behind the recently built one. Two ruined structures standing closer to the entrance into the gorge are said to be churches of "ʾabba Yoḥanni" and "ʾabba Aboli" (?).

19 Mss. photographed: MGM-001 “Miracles of Jesus”; MGM-002 “Homily of st. Michael; Miracles of St. Michal”; MGM-003 “Collection of Homilies”; MGM-004 “Pauline Epistles; Acts of the Apostles; Catholic Epistles; Apocalipse of John”; MGM-005 “Synaxarion (The first half of the years)”; MGM-006 “Miracles of Mary”; MGM-007 “Vita of the Apostles”; MGM-008 “Miracles of Jesus ”; MGM-009 “Synaxarion (The second half of the year)”; MGM-010 “Praise of Mary; Collection; Images of the Praise; A Part of Dǝggwa”; MGM-011 “Prayer of Incense; Missal”; MGM-012 “Vita of Libanos Miracles of Libanos”; MGM-013 “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus; Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”; MGM-014 “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus; Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”; MGM-015 “The Book of the Baptismal Rite”; MGM-016 “Vita of ʾArägawi”; MGM-017 “The Book of the Funeral Rite”; MGM-leaves 1 (18) Fragments of different manuscripts; MGM-leaves 2 (19) Fragments of different manuscripts.
Tabots of Michael, ʾAbrǝha and ʾAṣbǝḥa (reportedly the tabot of the old church), Mary, Twenty-Four Heavenly Priests.
